contentPricing:
Schacres Lake Pricing:

Pay per set $55.00
10 set punchcard $500.00

Memberships:
- Single Preferred $400.00 upfront, $35.00 per set
- Single All Access $2,200.00 (max 3 sets/day)
- Family All Access $4,800.00 (max 6 sets/day)

Waterski & Wakeboard Alberta Memberships will be required to ski. 
Click on the link below to get your $40 membership today. 

https://www.wswa.ca/wswamembership
contentIntro: I've had this dream for a lot of years to build a waterski lake, and the only thing better... now it's starting to come true. Come ski behind our Ski Nautique 200!
